bibl.title: The Words tonãxion and gonãxion in the Egyptian Papyri. <tonachion, gonachion>
bibl.note: The word tonãxion (B.G.U. II, 366, 14; 18; 403, 6) is clearly a misspelling (if not a misreading) of gonãxion, and like the latter means a cloak or a wrap that can either serve as an article of clothing or as a blanket. <tonachion, gonachion>
MAYERSON Philip, The Words tonãxion and gonãxion in the Egyptian Papyri. <tonachion, gonachion>
